hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -x -e
cat > site.conf <<EOF BB_GIT_SHALLOW ?= "1" BB_GIT_SHALLOW_DEPTH ?= "1" # Usage in a recipe with multiple named uris or multiple named branches BB_GIT_SHALLOW_DEPTH_doc = ""
# u-boot-edm.bb #SRCSERVER_pn-u-boot-edm = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/uboot-imx-edm.git" #SRCBRANCH_pn-u-boot-edm = "tn-imx_v2018.03_4.14.98_2.0.0_ga-wip" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-u-boot-edm = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" # becc33ae43d571f497f94588bc86ecab5cc23fbc #SRCREV_pn-u-boot-edm = "7829ea5ee9a829811677868eb8ebae335eab854b" #SRC_URI_pn-u-boot-edm = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}"
# u-boot-script.bb #SRCSERVER_pn-u-boot-script = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/uboot-imx-edm.git" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-u-boot-script = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw"
# linux-firmware-brcm-tn.bb #SRCSERVER_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/brcm_firmware.git" #SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "master" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" #SRCREV_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "\${AUTOREV}" #SRC_URI_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" #S_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "\${WORKDIR}/git"
# linux-firmware-qca-tn.bb SRCSERVER_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/qca_firmware.git" SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "caf-wlan/CNSS.LEA.NRT_3.0" SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRCREV_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "efa5726f00863a2a9e5dbf5708a5c116ec4b6092" SRC_URI_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" S_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "\${WORKDIR}/git"
# linux-tn-imx.bb #KERNEL_SRC_pn-linux-tn-imx = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/tn-kernel.git" #SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-tn-imx = "tn-imx_4.14.98_2.0.0_ga-wip" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-tn-imx = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" # 2cdfa5e0f3e736a3d798efe835262f2a51445dde #SRCREV_pn-linux-tn-imx = "2cdfa5e0f3e736a3d798efe835262f2a51445dde" #SRC_URI_pn-linux-tn-imx = "\${KERNEL_SRC};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" # Remove the upstream history from our kernel repo, keeping our own #BB_GIT_SHALLOW_REVS_pn-linux-tn-imx = "921765ac1d28eeeabb2d85305df2c3f9cc6426a4" #BB_GIT_SHALLOW_DEPTH_pn-linux-tn-imx = "" # Keep the branches in linux-tn-imx repositories #BB_GIT_SHALLOW_TRIM_REFS_pn-linux-tn-imx = "0"
# afloader.bb #TECHNEXION_GITHUB_MIRROR_pn-afloader = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/fpga/afloader.git" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-afloader = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" #SRC_URI_pn-afloader = "\${TECHNEXION_GITHUB_MIRROR};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" SRCREV_pn-afloader = "87814f59c55002ec388d5a508d10300bf5b8d140"
# axonfabric-firmware.bb #TECHNEXION_GITHUB_MIRROR_pn-axonfabric-firmware = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/fpga/axonfabric-firmware.git" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-axonfabric-firmware = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" #SRC_URI_pn-axonfabric-firmware = "\${TECHNEXION_GITHUB_MIRROR};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" SRCREV_pn-axonfabric-firmware = "409677369d4ccd764fde5dc7ac0f7569251e87c7"
# imx-m4-demos-tn.bb #SRCREV_pn-imx-m4-demos-tn = "4eb89db96ffca5f17becebf1363f0a00df534a00" #M4_SRC_pn-imx-m4-demos-tn = "git://10.20.30.20:/volume1/internal_git/edm/imx-m4-demos-tn.git" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-imx-m4-demos-tn = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" #SRC_URI_pn-imx-m4-demos-tn = "\${M4_SRC};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}"
#RDEPENDS_packagegroup-tn-tools_remove = "thermal-imx-test"
EOF

#!/bin/bash -x -e
GITSERVER="10.20.30.20" GITMIRROR="10.88.88.8" chmod 0600 ~/.ssh/id_rsa ssh-keyscan ${GITSERVER} >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts ssh-keyscan ${GITMIRROR} >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts
# replaces the host URL and revision with internal git server sed -e "s,https://github.com/TechNexion,ssh://rdsw@10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/,g" -i sources/meta-boot2qt/scripts/manifest.xml #sed -e "s,3388de490387d82e2a87c95fe3bee245fe274d0c,sumo_4.14.98-2.0.0_GA-yocto-wip,g" -i sources/meta-boot2qt/scripts/manifest.xml cat sources/meta-boot2qt/scripts/manifest.xml
OUTDIR=/home/jenkins/build/boot2qt-images CACHEDIR=/home/jenkins/workspace/src/yocto2.5/cache DLDIR=/home/jenkins/workspace/src/yocto2.5/downloads SSTATEDIR=/home/jenkins/workspace/src/yocto2.5/sstate-cache
# clear and meta-edm-bsp-release folder on external volume rm -f -R ./sources/meta-edm-bsp-release
# machine confs CONFs=("pico-imx8mq" "pico-imx8mm" "flex-imx8mm" "edm-imx8mq" "pico-imx7" "pico-imx6" "edm-imx7" "edm-imx6")
# setup environment variables for building # BASEBOARDs=("pi" "nymph" "dwarf" "hobbit") # DISPLAYs=("lvds7" "hdmi720p" "hdmi1080p" "lcd" "lvds7_hdmi720p") # WLANs=("qca" "brcm" "ath-pci" "all") setup_env_vars () { case $1 in pico-imx8mq) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" pan="ili9881c" ;; pico-imx8mm) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" pan="ili9881c" ;; edm-imx8mq) board="wizard" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" pan="ili9881c" ;; flex-imx8mm) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" pan="ili9881c" ;; axon-imx8mm) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" pan="ili9881c" ;; pico-imx6) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" pan="" ;; pico-imx7) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" pan="" ;; pico-imx6ul) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" pan="" ;; edm-imx6) board="fairy" disp="lvds7" wlan="qca" pan="" ;; axon-imx6) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" pan="" ;; edm-imx7) board="gnome" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" pan="" ;; tep1-imx7) board="gnome" disp="lcd" wlan="ath-pci" pan="" ;; tep1-imx6ul) board="gnome" disp="lcd" wlan="ath-pci" pan="" ;; tek-imx6) board="tek" disp="lvds10" wlan="ath-pci" pan="" ;; tek3-imx6ul) board="tek" disp="lvds10" wlan="ath-pci" pan="" ;; *) ;; esac }
# update ./conf/local.conf setting setup_local_conf () { CURDIR=.
# setup conf/local.conf if grep "^DL_DIR.*" $CURDIR/conf/local.conf > /dev/null ; then sed -e 's|^DL_DIR.*|DL_DIR = "'$DLDIR'"|g' -i $CURDIR/conf/local.conf else echo "DL_DIR = \"$DLDIR\"" >> $CURDIR/conf/local.conf fi if grep "^SSTATE_DIR.*" $CURDIR/conf/local.conf > /dev/null ; then sed -e 's|^SSTATE_DIR.*|SSTATE_DIR = "'$SSTATEDIR'"|g' -i $CURDIR/conf/local.conf else echo "SSTATE_DIR = \"$SSTATEDIR\"" >> $CURDIR/conf/local.conf fi
# add TN_TOKEN to local.conf echo "PA_TOKEN ?= \"SbtQ_mC4fvJRA88_9jB7\"" >> $CURDIR/conf/local.conf
# re-enable remove built works in local.conf echo "INHERIT += \"rm_work\"" >> $CURDIR/conf/local.conf
# add image-buildinfo echo "INHERIT += \"image-buildinfo\"" >> $CURDIR/conf/local.conf
# filter out thermal-imx-test echo "RDPENDS_packagegroup-tn-tools_remove = \"thermal-imx-test\" >> $CURDIR/conf/local.conf
unset CURDIR }
for conf in ${CONFs[*]}; do cd $WORKSPACE
./sources/meta-boot2qt/b2qt-init-build-env init --device $conf
unset MACHINE export MACHINE=$conf source setup-environment.sh
# call setup_env_vars() to get our default values setup_env_vars $conf
# call setup_local_conf to replace DL_DIR and SSTAT_DIR setup_local_conf
# Copy the site.conf for overriding QCA firmware downloads cp $WORKSPACE/site.conf ./conf/site.conf
# Export uEnv.txt variables export BASE_BOARD=$board export DISPLAY_INFO=$disp export RF_FIRMWARES=$wlan export DISPLAY_PANEL=$pan export BB_ENV_EXTRAWHITE="$BB_ENV_EXTRAWHITE BASE_BOARD DISPLAY_INFO RF_FIRMWARES DISPLAY_PANEL"
# export out the conf and bitbake environment settings cat ./conf/local.conf cat ./conf/bblayers.conf cat ./conf/site.conf export
#bitbake u-boot-edm -c cleanall #bitbake linux-tn-imx -c cleanall #bitbake b2qt-embedded-qt5-image -c cleanall bitbake b2qt-embedded-qt5-image -e | grep ^OVERRIDES bitbake b2qt-embedded-qt5-image
# SDK / QBSP for Linux bitbake meta-toolchain-b2qt-embedded-qt5-sdk bitbake meta-b2qt-embedded-qbsp
# SDK / QBSP for MS-Windows SDKMACHINE=i686-mingw32 bitbake meta-toolchain-b2qt-embedded-qt5-sdk SDKMACHINE=i686-mingw32 bitbake meta-b2qt-embedded-qbsp
done
